title: LWM2M Quickstart
desc: When devices send registrations or updates all instances are read.
prereqs: LWM2M device that supports DTLS and PSK encryption

title: LWM2M to Microsoft Azure IoT
desc: Integrate LWM2M devices quickly to Microsoft Azure IoT Hub.
prereqs: IoT Hub and service account connection string
Import the 'LWM2M Quickstart' template

title: Quectel BG96 to Microsoft Azure IoT
desc: Integrate Quectel modules quickly to Microsoft Azure IoT Hub.
prereqs: IoT Hub and service account connection string
Import the 'LWM2M Quickstart' template

title: Onboard Quectel BG96
desc: Import Quectel module to an existing service.
prereqs: Exsting LWM2M service defined in account

title: Chirpstack quickstart
desc: Simple configuration of the Chirpstack LORA service, no decoders will be imported.
prereqs: Chirpstack server with correctly configured application profile

title: Publish to Azure IoT Hub
desc: Integrate data from devices quickly to Microsoft Azure IoT Hub.
prereqs: IoT Hub and service account connection string
Trigger generating generic 'data' events

title: Publish to Azure Event Hub
desc: Integrate data from devices quickly to Microsoft Event Hub.
prereqs: Event Hub and service account connection string
Trigger generating generic 'data' events

title: Publish to Azure CosmosDB
desc: Insert records directly into CosmosDB.
prereqs: CosmosDB database and a service account connection string
Trigger generating generic 'data' events

title: Publish to InfluxDB
desc: Insert metrics into InfluxDB.
prereqs: InfluxDB server
Trigger generating generic 'data' events, data must be numeric.

title: LWM2M to AWS IoT Core
desc: Integrate LWM2M devices quickly to Microsoft AWS IoT Core.
prereqs: IoT Core and service account connection string
Import the 'LWM2M Quickstart' template

title: Publish to AWS DynamoDB
desc: Insert records directly into DynamoDB.

title: Publish to AWS Kinesis
desc: Insert records directly into Kinesis.
prereqs: Kinesis topic and a service account connection string
Trigger generating generic 'data' events

desc: Integrate LWM2M devices quickly to Google IoT Core.

LoRa device with service from Chirpstack or actility
